channel.title: Is Hamachi safe to use?
channel.description:
Alright, there is a server I would like to play on and my dad think hamachi is not "safe." But! He said that if I could show him some way that hamachi is "safe", then he would allow me to use it. So, back to the topic, I need reviews on Hamachi! I have used it my self at my mother's house and nothing has happend yet.
I thank you for your time to stop and reply
Your friend, pwn3d :P
Alright, lolz I my views go up by the second so I know people know that I need help. So don't just sit there...If you use hamachi and you happen to stop by this thread, just stop and leave a reply...Is it that hard?

item.title: Is Hamachi safe to use?

i use it and its safe for me up till now

item.title: Is Hamachi safe to use?
item.dc:creator: @MoparOwnsJoo MoparOwnsJoo
item.description:
@MoparOwnsJoo wrote:

Hamachi is safe to use. I have used it for about 1 year now and it never effected my computer in a bad way. No viruses and no lag. (Just how I like it :))

Read full topic

item.title: Is Hamachi safe to use?
item.dc:creator: @i_gr0ww33d_i i gr0ww33d i
item.description:
@i_gr0ww33d_i wrote:

[quote=“n00b pk3r, post:2, topic:55741”]nothing is garreteed to work and be safe download at your own risk

~pk3r[/quote]

Well i say hell to that… Hamachi has never gave me a virus and iv’e used it for 3 years. nothing has ever went wrong for me. i GIve you a post of encouragement

Read full topic

item.title: Is Hamachi safe to use?
item.dc:creator: @pwn3d pwn3d
item.description:
@pwn3d wrote:

Alright, lol, not excactly the reply I wanted but, I am grateful for your honesty. Hmm one thing I was looking for was, how has Hamachi worked for you in the past? Any problems? (reply to noobpker, btw)

Read full topic
